==Trivia==
*{{w|Winter counts}} also known as ''Waníyetu Wówapi'' or ''Waníyetu Iyáwapi'' in {{w|Lakota language|Lakota}}, are pictorial calendars or histories in which tribal records and events were recorded by Native Americans in North America.
